about_the_game:
In Danger Horizon, every step you take could be your last. Immerse yourself in battle where you’re thrust into high-stakes combat across different areas of operation, battling both human enemies and horrific, mutated creatures. Whether you’re alone or with a squad, every choice, every action, could mean the difference between life and death.

Single Player/CO-OP  (PVE):
Step into the boots of a special ops soldier deployed to the heart of a global crisis. Danger Horizon unfolds as a mysterious global virus has spread, leaving only chaos in its wake. With your survival instincts tested to the limit, you’ll need to engage in tactical combat to survive, you are part of a private military that has split apart causing confusion in who is the reason for the outbreak for your company owns all the sites where the outbreak seems the most likely to have originated.

Multiplayer (PVP):
The stakes are even higher in Danger Horizon’s multiplayer modes, where up to 30 players clash in fierce firefights. From small-scale tactical skirmishes to large battles across diverse maps, each player is vital to the team. Work with your squad to outsmart your opponents in classic deathmatches, capturing strategic points in team-based modes, Danger Horizon offers a fun and competitive experience.

Zombies Mode:
When the virus spreads, the world falls apart, In Danger Horizon’s Zombie Mode, you and your team must survive the onslaught of a grotesque horde that grows stronger with each wave. Equip yourself with weapons and fight to the last breath. As the waves progress, the difficulty ramps up, what you bring to the fight matters make sure your loadout is useful, For the night has its own set of challenges.

Features:

  • Intense First-Person Combat: Fight your way thru the unknown, if you find your back to a wall and out of ammo use your weapon as a instrument of destruction, melee your way to victory, or pick up your foes weapon and continue the firefight!

  • Multiple Game Modes: Choose between intense solo modes, competitive PVP, co-op PVE, and terrifying zombie survival co-op or solo

  •  Environments: fight in a variety of military bases and outposts.

  • Customization: Personalize your weapon and your kit to your missions needs.

  • Co-op and Multiplayer Thrills: Team up with friends or face off against rivals in heart-pounding PVP or PVE

  • Realistic, Brutal Combat: The stakes are always high in a world where danger lurks at every corner.

Whether you're taking on the hostile forces or fighting off waves of zombies, Danger Horizon challenges you to survive by any means necessary. This is not just a game; it’s a fight for survival. Are you ready to face these challenges head on?

content_descriptors.notes: Danger Horizon has mature assets on some maps that involve blood and gore. Some bodies are covered and other bloody items can be seen. Bullets and grenades can and will cause limb damage and parts of the player's body to explode.

name: Danger Horizon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X, Intel Core i7-9700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 (8 GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3800X, Intel Core i7-10700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 (12 GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: Danger Horizon is a multiplayer, first-person shooter game made using Unreal Engine 5. The game features realistic gunplay, and advanced blood and gore features that everyone can enjoy.
